document.discussion_title: Blocked Facebook ads unblocked, for now
document.topic_text: Almost every penny Facebook makes comes through advertising - and so any threat to that model really does put the entire company at risk. Which is why Facebook is moving quickly to get ahead in its running battle with Adblock Plus , a
document.post: Almost every penny Facebook makes comes through advertising - and so any threat to that model really does put the entire company at risk. Which is why Facebook is moving quickly to get ahead in its running battle with Adblock Plus , a
